alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Haywood; Lake; Lauderdale; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 7:33PM CDT until May 21 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Crockett County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Weakley County in west Tennessee... Dyer County in west Tennessee... Western Gibson County in west Tennessee... Obion County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Haywood County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Lake County in west Tennessee... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 733 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Malden to Hayti to near Dell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Martin, Union City, Ripley, Fulton, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Newbern, South Fulton, Dyer, Halls, Troy, Kenton, Rutherford, Obion, Clayton, Chestnut Bluff, Bradleytown, Unionville and Forked Deer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Haywood; Lake; Lauderdale; Obion; Weakley
